item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Jennifer Weiner
item.description: "It's as if the fasion designers decided that once a woman hit a certain weight, she'd have no need for business suits, for skirts and blazers, for anything except glorified sweatsuits, and they tried to apologize for dressing us like overaged Teletubbies by silk-screening daisies on the tops." -- Jennifer Weiner

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Babe!" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I like the way you've let your hair go curly," he finally said. "Suits your personality. Lots of energy, not much control, sexy as hell," Joe Morelli to Stephanie Plum" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Exercise improves your sex life. Ranger to Stephanie" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Was a fast easy reading, Good to take your mind off of anything serious for a while" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I am not menopausal. I just wanted half an hour alone. Is that too much to ask? A crappy half hour!" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Marisa de los Santos
item.description: "We talked and talked and talked. Maybe love comes in at the eyes, but not nearly as much as it comes in at the ears, at least in my experience. As we talked, lights flicked on inside my head; by the end of the night I was a planterium." -- Marisa de los Santos

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater...The love we have for each other is bigger than these small differences. And that's the key. It's like a big pie chart, and the love in a relationship has to be the biggest piece. Love can make up for a lot." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's all in the view. That's what I mean about forever, too. For any one of us our forever could end in an hour, or a hundred years from now. You never know for sure, so you'd better make every second count." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Some things don't last forever, but some things do. Like a good song, or a good book, or a good memory you can take out and unfold in your darkest times, pressing down on the corners and peering in close, hoping you still recognize the person you see there." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's just that...I just think that some things are meant to be broken. Imperfect. Chaotic. It's the universe's way of providing contrast, you know? There have to be a few holes in the road. It's how life is." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "What is family? They were the people who claimed you. In good, in bad, in parts or in whole, they were the ones who showed up, who stayed in there, regardless. It wasn't just about blood relations or shared chromosomes, but something wider, bigger. We had many families over time. Our family of origin, the family we created, and the groups you moved through while all of this was happening: friends, lovers, sometimes even strangers. None of them perfect, and we couldn't expect them to be. You can't make any one person your world. The trick was to take what each could give you and build your world from it." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "You can't always get the perfect moment. Sometimes, you just have to do the best you can under the circumstances." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It was just one of those things," I said, "You know, that just happen. You don't think or plan. You just do it." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "You should never be surprised when someone treats you with respect, you should expect it." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "You can't make any one person your world. The trick is to take what each can give you and build a world from it." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Joseph Brodsky
item.description: "There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them." -- Joseph Brodsky

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "For Harry Potter I have all the time in the world." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Ashley (angelashly) add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be." -- J.K. Rowling
